LanguageData.CSCBed.label: Christmas bed
LanguageData.CSCBed.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting in christmas style.
LanguageData.CSCDoubleBed.label: Christmas double bed
LanguageData.CSCDoubleBed.description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people in christmas style.
LanguageData.CSCDresser.label: Chistmas dresser
LanguageData.CSCDresser.description: A dresser in christmas style. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.CSCEndTable.label: Christmas end table
LanguageData.CSCEndTable.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable in christmas style. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
